quotes.quote: Purity or impurity depends on oneself, no one can purify another.
Purity is receptivity, the ability to sit and wait patiently, for as long as necessary, for the coming of the light.
Purity of mind and idleness are incompatible.
Purity in the heart is like medicine in the body, it expels disease.
Purity is very fragile when it takes physical manifestation. It is very, very strong in its original aspect.
Purity of personal life is the one indispensable condition for building up a sound education.
Purity is something that comes from another world. It's a radiance that enters into this world of transformation and change.
Purity of heart means the control of the imagination and the rigorous care of the affections.
Purity of heart illuminates your life with light and strength of character.
Purity of heart is the noblest inheritance, and love the fairest ornament, of woman.
Purity without balance is its own corruption.
Purity of heart is love for the weak who constantly fall.
The purity of man is the absence of something, the purity of Jesus is the presence of something.
Purity of speech, of the mind, of the senses, and of a compassionate heart are needed by one who desires to rise to the divine platform.
The purity men love is like the mists which envelope the earth, and not like the azure ether beyond.
Purity is a negative state and therefore contrary to nature.
It was the purest love without purpose other than love itself. Without tenure or jealousy.
Our purity of taste is best tested by its universality, for if we can only admire this thing or that, we maybe use that our cause for liking is of a finite and false nature.
Purity is when there is no anxiety, no worry, no thinking.
Purity does not mean crushing the instincts but having the instincts as servants and not the master of the spirit.
Purity of soul cannot be lost without consent.
Purity is the diamond of the soul.
Purity of mind and conduct is the first glory of a woman.
Purity of heart is to will one thing.
Purity of life is the highest and truest art.
But purity is difficult to understand in the abstract like corruption, we understand purification best when it's concrete, physical.
A pure heart is superlatively rare and even more attractive.
Purity means lack of hatred, jealousy, fear, greed and lust the absence of anything that can stain consciousness.
Purity is the power to contemplate defilement.
The pursuit of purity is not about the suppression of lust, but about the reorientation of one's life to a larger goal.
